content: https://www.aahaxi.com1. Just need to use TRC20 wallet to transfer money2. After the transfer, the game judgment result is based on the block height hash value3. No need to recharge, simple operation, completely anonymous, block hash value cannot be changed, fair, open and just5. Tens of millions of prize pools, the public chain can be queried, strength, reputation, long-term
